name: Flight DS-107
description:
Space. The Final Frontier. 

Well thats what we used to think anyway, before we discovered how to cross into other dimensions, but I guess ‘Other Dimensions, the Final Frontier’ doesn’t have the same ring to it. 

Anyway, you are a pilot willing to sacrifice your life for the, erm…. Well, no reason at all. 

You are going to be sent across dimensions with your only task being to go as far as you can so your onboard computer ‘CL1FF’ can gather and send us as much data as possible. What will we use this data for? Well thats classified, maybe. 

In Flight DS-107 you will take control of an inter-dimensional spacecraft and are tasked to jump between dimensions making sure your power and life support systems stay online. During your mission there will be power outages, overheating equipment and depleting resources. How long can you last?
